author: lsoffi
body:
PR from E/gamma for 2017 IDs: 
Photon cut based/Photon MVA/Electron cut based

-VID implementation of Photon Cut Based ID
-VID implementation of Electron Cut Based ID with new H/e scaling cut
-VID implementation of Photon MVA ID

-Bug fix in TagProbePairMaker.cc to skip already invalidated pairs
-Add dumpPileup.py which was missing in the release
-Add PFClusterIsolation in PhotonIDValueMapProducer.cc

@Sam-Harper @ikrav
title: 2017 Photon ID (cut based +MVA) Electron ID (cut based) implementation
